participant_1.background:
My job is secure and I get paid well.
i have two kids.
I like to create my own clothes because it allows me to express myself and be unique.
my favorite tv show is rick and morty.
i collect dolls.

participant_2.background:
I read books to inspire me to achieve my goals.
i work at a coffee house.
I have no siblings, but I do have a few friends who love to come over and try my new coffee flavors.
i own many cars.
i eat ice cream when i am sad.

content.text: Hello! I am interested in learning how to sew.
Hello! I love to sew. I am actually a seamstress for a coffee shop.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to be able to make my own clothes.
It is not that hard! I can show you if you want.
That would be great! I have a few dolls I have been wanting to make clothes for.
That is a great idea! I love making things for my family and friends.
I like to do the same. I love creating things and seeing the smile on people's faces when they get it.
That is so sweet! I love that about sewing. It is so rewarding.
What is your favorite thing to sew?
I love making dresses. I have always loved dresses.
That is so cool! I love dresses too!
That would be so much fun! Let me know when you are free.
I am free most weekends. How about next weekend?
Perfect! I will bring my dolls and we can make them some clothes!
Sounds like a plan! I will see you next weekend!
